Jekyll Doc Theme

Lists

Unordered lists

Unordered lists are rendered like this.

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

or

  • Item 1
  • Item 2
  • Item 3

Ordered list

Ordered lists are rendered like this.

  1. Item 1
  2. Item 2
  3. Item 3

Task list

  • hello, this is a todo item
  • hello, this is another todo item
  • goodbye, this item is done
